# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position (x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (no other positions found) and another stone furnace at position (x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position (111.5, -32.0)
Consists of 
-  Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0) 
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport system at position (63.5, -53.5)
Consists of 
-  Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)
-  Belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
-  Ensure that burner entities have fuel before using them.
-  Burner mining drills and burners inserters are currently without fuel.

### Errors when using entities without ingredients
-  Ensure that entities have the necessary ingredients before using them.
-  Stone furnace at position (x=60.0 y=-60.0) is currently without ingredients.

### Errors when using steam engines without connection
-  Ensure that steam engines are connected to the power grid before using them.
-  Steam engine at position (x=117.5 y=-30.5) is currently not connected.

### Errors when using pipe groups without fluid
-  Ensure that pipe groups have fluid before using them.
-  Pipe group at position (x=107.5 y=-34.5) is currently empty.

### Errors when using electricity groups without connection
-  Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into the electric network before using them.
-  Electricity group at position (x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668) is currently not plugged in.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or important variables were found in the given execution logs.
